name: VRecycle
description:
VRecycle

Separate the waste that comes over the assembly line. Grab it and throw it to the correct bin. But be quick because there will be more.

VRecycle is a simple (prototype) game made in Unity. You goal is to get the different trash inside the right bin before the time is run out. There are a total of 10 levels at the moments.

Requirements

You need to have a HTC vive with a windows computer that can handle VR.
